Config.SqlAfter: --DELETE FROM kfClientComConfgNew --辅助核算项目清掉多余 DELETE FROM kfMulEntityInputSort WHERE ID<>1 AND ParentID=1 AND ID<>3000268 update kfMulEntityInputSort set Name='天伟表业' where ID=3000268 update kfMulEntityInputSort set Name='成本类别',ParentID=3000268 where ID=3000040--物料分类 update kfMulEntityInputSort set Name='材料分类',ParentID=3000268 where ID=3000220--包装状态 if not exists (select top 1 1 from kfMulEntityInputSort where ID=3000271) begin set identity_insert kfMulEntityInputSort on insert into kfMulEntityInputSort(ID,Name,PointID,ParentID,[Level],IsDetail,Forbidden) values(3000271,'价格类型',3000846,3000268,3,1,0) set identity_insert kfMulEntityInputSort off end else update kfMulEntityInputSort set Name='价格类型',ParentID=3000268 where ID=3000271--价格类型 if not exists (select top 1 1 from kfMulEntityInputSort where ID=3000272)--主版本号 begin set identity_insert kfMulEntityInputSort on insert into kfMulEntityInputSort(ID,Name,PointID,ParentID,[Level],IsDetail,Forbidden) values(3000272,'主版本号',3000856,3000268,3,1,0) set identity_insert kfMulEntityInputSort off end --角色加所有角色组 SET IDENTITY_INSERT kfSysRole on IF not EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM kfSysRole WHERE ID=2) INSERT INTO kfSysRole(ID,Name,Forbidden,Description,System,ParentID,Level,IsDetail,IsGroup,IsUseDataAccess,IsUseFieldAccess,RemoteAdress,RemotePort,IsUdp) VALUES (2,'所有角色',0,'所有角色',1,0,1,0,1,0,0,'',0,0) SET IDENTITY_INSERT kfSysRole off --编码规则 SET IDENTITY_INSERT kfBusiCodeRule ON if not exists(select 1 from kfBusiCodeRule where id=3000085) Insert into kfBusiCodeRule([ID],[Name],[Forbidden],[DataEntityID],[Prefix],[DigitalCount],[Postfix],[CurrentNumber],[CurNumRule],[isNotEdit],[UIMainContainerID],[IsAfterSave],[ColName]) values (3000085,'核价申请单',0,3000829,'',6,'',16,'0',0,0,0,'Number') ELSE UPDATE kfBusiCodeRule SET [ColName]='Number' WHERE id=3000085 if not exists(select 1 from kfBusiCodeRule where id=3000087) Insert into kfBusiCodeRule([ID],[Name],[Forbidden],[DataEntityID],[Prefix],[DigitalCount],[Postfix],[CurrentNumber],[CurNumRule],[isNotEdit],[UIMainContainerID],[IsAfterSave],[ColName]) values (3000087,'核价BOM单',0,3000832,'',6,'',1,'0',0,0,0,'Number') ELSE UPDATE kfBusiCodeRule SET [ColName]='Number' WHERE id=3000087 if not exists(select 1 from kfBusiCodeRule where id=3000090) Insert into kfBusiCodeRule([ID],[Name],[Forbidden],[DataEntityID],[Prefix],[DigitalCount],[Postfix],[CurrentNumber],[CurNumRule],[isNotEdit],[UIMainContainerID],[IsAfterSave],[ColName]) values (3000090,'业务报价单',0,3000841,'',6,'',1,'0',0,0,0,'Number') ELSE UPDATE kfBusiCodeRule SET [ColName]='Number' WHERE id=3000090 if not exists(select 1 from kfBusiCodeRule where id=3000091) Insert into kfBusiCodeRule([ID],[Name],[Forbidden],[DataEntityID],[Prefix],[DigitalCount],[Postfix],[CurrentNumber],[CurNumRule],[isNotEdit],[UIMainContainerID],[IsAfterSave],[ColName]) values (3000091,'成本预算单',0,3000838,'',6,'',1,'0',0,0,0,'Number') ELSE UPDATE kfBusiCodeRule SET [ColName]='Number' WHERE id=3000091 if not exists(select 1 from kfBusiCodeRule where id=3000092) Insert into kfBusiCodeRule([ID],[Name],[Forbidden],[DataEntityID],[Prefix],[DigitalCount],[Postfix],[CurrentNumber],[CurNumRule],[isNotEdit],[UIMainContainerID],[IsAfterSave],[ColName]) values (3000092,'组合BOM清单',0,3000836,'',6,'',3,'0',0,0,0,'Number') ELSE UPDATE kfBusiCodeRule SET [ColName]='Number' WHERE id=3000092 SET IDENTITY_INSERT kfBusiCodeRule OFF -- delete from kfGridColProperty where UIControlID in (select UIControlID from kfUIControl where MainContainerID in (3004640,3004615,3004617)) delete from kfControlProp where ControlID in (select UIControlID from kfUIControl where MainContainerID in (3004640,3004615,3004617)) delete from kfUIControl where MainContainerID in (3004640,3004615,3004617) delete from kfUIMainContainerProperty where UIMainContainerPropertyID in (3004640,3004615,3004617) delete from kfuimaincontainer where UIMainContainerID in (3004640,3004615,3004617)
